entries.content: Read and understood the Writing Gym context - a coaching tool that builds writers' skills through structured reflection rather than AI rewrites. Ready to build the prototype: pre-draft questions → draft → self-assessment → AI assessment → comparison loop.

Scaffolded project structure: React+Vite+Tailwind client on port 3000, Express server on port 3001 with API proxy. App.jsx has step state machine (context→draft→self_assess→ai_assess→compare). Server has placeholder endpoints for /api/extract-criteria and /api/assess-draft.

Built PreDraftQuestions component with 4 coaching questions (audience, intent, concerns, type). Wired into App.jsx with validation, loading state, error handling, and API call to /api/extract-criteria. Shows extracted criteria on draft step.

entries.message: Initial scaffold: React+Vite+Tailwind client, Express server with PreDraftQuestions component

entries.content: Implemented /api/extract-criteria with Anthropic API. Prompt extracts 3-5 criteria from user's context answers, phrased as ratable statements. Uses claude-sonnet-4-20250514, returns JSON with id, description, extracted_from, and scale.

Built DraftInput (text area with criteria reminder, char count) and SelfAssessment (1-5 scale buttons for each criterion with labels). Wired into App.jsx flow: context → draft → self_assess → compare. Comparison view shows raw JSON for now.

Implemented /api/assess-draft with Anthropic API. Scores each criterion 1-5 with reasoning. Prompt includes full context (audience, intent, concerns, type), criteria list, and draft. Returns scores and reasoning objects keyed by criterion ID.

Completed prototype learning loop! ComparisonView shows self vs AI scores side-by-side with delta indicators (overestimate/underestimate), AI reasoning, average scores, and Revise Draft button for iteration.
